readable.title: 3332136681_9aecf101fd
readable.content: A man in an orange vest and hat is shoveling rocks while another man in a yellow and blue jacket looks on . A man with an orange vest is shoveling rocks . A man with a yellow vest shovels rocks while another man watches . One construction worker in an orange vest shoveling rocks while another one in a blue vest watches . The man , wearing a worker 's vest , is shoveling rocks .
